text:
<!channel> Repeating some of our housekeeping things from lecture tonight here:
1. <https://forms.gle/jQikReTox2VUBnsM8|Ready for Placement Survey> is due January 18. This is a lengthier survey and will require links to your resume, individual project slide deck, and professional development plan. 
2. <https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1eTiZSH3CTGswue37d5tVcxhMnXpxR54CGfSLLDlbsDU/copy#slide=id.g274a2c8ef6_0_0|Individual Slide Deck> is due January 18.
3. <https://docs.google.com/document/d/11luFsZpJhDNFrhns5aG7isN5EIjgp3QgO_Df168LCkE/copy?usp=sharing|Professional Development Plan> is due January 22. Submit your link in the Ready for Placement Survey, but you will have until 1/22 to finish. You will receive a grade for it on Canvas, but won't need to submit anything there for it.
4. Interview Day 2 is January 15. If you had an interview on Day 1 and did not pass, you received a message from us earlier today. We are hopeful everyone who needs an interview of any kind on Monday will be scheduled, but we will prioritize by volunteer availability in the following order: people who have not yet had an interview, people who have not reached the threshold for graduation, and finally, people who have not reached the threshold for apprenticeship. 
I am also linking <https://launchcode.instructure.com/courses/86/pages/liftoff-class-overview|this page> as a reminder that has the topics and due dates for all things Liftoff since there are a number of things that hit right at the end.

attachments.fallback: Google Docs: Ready for Placement Survey
attachments.title: Ready for Placement Survey
attachments.text: Completion of this survey is a graduation requirement, regardless of your interest in the apprenticeship program. Fill out the following questions so we can start creating your candidate profile and closing out your classroom experience with us. Stick to the sentence/character lengths wherever indicated.

text: Can we submit the survey with links even if the individual slide deck and professional development plan are not completed?

elements.text: Can we submit the survey with links even if the individual slide deck and professional development plan are not completed?

text: The individual slide deck is due with the Ready for Placement Survey, but you can make edits on the Professional Development Plan until 1/22.
